alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:39AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Forest, Vilas and Oneida Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 338 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Turtle Flambeau Flowage to near Lac Du Flambeau to near Willow Lake. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lac Du Flambeau, Willow Reservoir and Squirrel Lake around 345 AM CDT. Newbold, Rice Creek Natural Area and Rainbow Flowage around 400 AM CDT. Boulder Junction and Crystal Lake Scout Reservation around 405 AM CDT. Eagle River and Johnson Lake Barrens Natural Area around 415 AM CDT. Kentuck Lake Campground around 425 AM CDT. Phelps and Headwaters Wilderness around 430 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Gagen, Luna-White Deer Campground, Sayner, Anvil Lake Campground, Harshaw, Hazelhurst, Upper Buckatabon Springs Natural Area, Argonne, Goodnow and Trout Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
